r_text: Happy customer always.. excellent quality of food Always fresh and tasty. Delivers fast I order frequently

The food is delicious!! There are various unique combinations of different tastes to try! We have fallen in love with the picanha steak burger and the sweet potato fries. The pork chop was also very nice and the french fries. The place is very romantic and quiet. Totally worth visiting this restaurant!

The food here is soooo delicious! Yhe waiter recommended the Kateifi pulled pork for a starter - I haven't had anything similar before - super tasty! The service was great - very friendly and helpful staff willing to answer all our questions!Also, we really appreciated how careful they were to follow all necessary covid19 precautions! Will definitely return!

I had a business lunch there. Service was really good, staff very helpful, the steak that I had was cooked perfectly, fried potatoes were original french fries thin and crispy and their salad was fresh and very tasty. I did not have desert but looking at the other tables I glanced some really nice ones! Next time!
We had a great experience! Food was delicious. Creative cuisine. Not expensive at all. Good value for money. Nice atmosphere although it is a bit small. Friendly staff.

We visited this restaurant after we read the positive reviews on TripAdvisor. The restaurant recently opened after the pandemic. We ordered the mojito salad which was ok and the Greek Kataifi. Both dishes were average. My partner ordered the steak which was very dry although we have requested to be medium it was a bit overcooked and I got the stuffed chicken which had a tastless green crust. There part of the menu with burgers but we did not try them.In summary this restaurant has mediocre food and I am not sure why people rave about it. We will not return!
Great place great food and nice friendly and cozy atmosphere The staff there are very helpful and the chef is excellent

Our first time here. Not quite sure what to expect although reviews were good. The place inside is like what our grandparents' houses used to look like. Furniture and decorations take you back to the 60s-70s. We all ordered different dishes to try out. Starter salad was excellent, fresh with great dressing. Our dishes were mostly red meat. Cooked to perfection with style and imagination. The waitress was polite and with a smile which is a rare thing nowadays! I would recommend this place to anyone, although you need to reserve well in advance.

The decoration is simple and like step back in time ... the starter ie salmon with veggies was good and fresh and the main dish the steak with sweet potatoes are tasty too. However, the service is really slow more than 25 min after ordering to start receiving the et first dish !!! It‚Äôs nice place to visit if you have time and you need to enjoy the company and the food...! We paid around 50 euros for 2 person with soft drinks no alcohol not deserts.
Very nice and creative food. Prices are very reasonable and for the quality and quantity you get. They need to improve a bit their service as it is a bit slow.For sure we are returning.

On arrival we were welcomed by the Owner - a great way. We then ordered a glass of Tsangarides Red and Alamos White, which were very enjoyable. Then we had a Picanha Steak with really good fries and was very delicious. We also had Fish and Chips which was also good. We shall return when we come back to Cyprus. Total cost was ‚Ç¨43.00 - very good value.

Although it has been established for at least five years this was our first visit and we were highly impressed. Having made a booking we were warmly greeted despite arriving a little late. The interior is tastefully decorated with a variety of furniture and some old sewing machines converted to tables lending some character. The menu in both Greek and English had a variety of dishes to suit all tastes and all appeared quite unique but appetising and not typical of other tavernas. Service was excellent, the food beautifully presented and very tasty. One main salad served us as a starter and was enough for four people. Our mains were delicious and we forced ourselves to share their tiramisu. The price was very reasonable and the husband and wife team also provide a comprehensive catering service. We look forward to our next visit.

This is a great place to eat in Nicosia. The food is great, the service is also good, and the prices quite reasonable. We visit there once a while, and have tried several items on the menu. All are well prepared and thought out. The meat is always cooked well and the both starters and mains are tasty. I miss some of the items on the older menu, like the steak sandwich. The menu is limited, but there will always be something to feast on. Try the burgers, the pork chop, the peca√±a, even their salads are good. Recommended.

I can judge from my only visit only. We madr a reservation for brunch since the place gets packed. I loved the interior, the atmosphere, the service and food. Prices are quite reasonable considering the quality. The place is a bit small though but cosy

Always I have good time in this restaurant. The atmosphere is calm and relaxing. The veggie risotto was very tasty and light and beautifully presented and the desert was nice too. The service good with slight delay. I recommend this place mainly for their menu which is different and has nice dishes.

Tasty foods, ambiance is so nice. All personals are very kind, smiling faces. We felt very comfortable and happy ourselves. So nice dinner, so happy moments but only Fridays dinner :(((((((Nicosia needs your team every night!MAGƒ∞C TEAM and I think, "It's not random"I will try to learn more about your restaurant story.Good luck. See you soon.
Nice place with interesting design inside. Dishes were tasty, we really liked the lemonade. Prices are not very expensive. However, the open hours a little bit strange.

So lovely to be back. 3 years since our last visit and great to catch up with the owners and see the restaurant thriving with some old favorites and new additions to the menu. Always tasty food and drink and good service. Will be back up on our next trip to Nicosia

Undeniably one of - if not THE best restaurant in Cyprus. The food is always very delicious and cooked to perfection! The flavours are very contemporary and the menu is updated regularly providing even more options! I would strongly recommend any steak or risotto!
The food is really good and creative!! The staff is very nice and polite and the service overall is very good!

Decor is inviting and cozy, service is friendly. When looking at the dishes being served around me, each dish had a unique touch.I opted for the vegetarian risotto. Dish was very colorful and the taste was nice.At 12 euros which is the same price of the lamb and more then the pork chop, i thought it was expensive. Vegetarian dishes are usually less expensive.
The cook shop has a great selection of dishes which are very well presented. The service is very friendly and the food tastes great!
Good food, reasonably priced and helpful and kind service. We had heard a lot about this place and visited it with kids and I must say we were all delighted with the experience. Keep up the good work

A really relaxing place to eat good food at good value. The place has a great ambience about it. The Service was good with smily faces and the chef came out to greet us and ask if everything was ok. I would be proud to take any one i know there.
Food is always excellent, coupled with the excellent service.I would recommend the vegetarian food options.

Have been to CookShop 2 times for lunch. Both an amazing experience! The menu is really creative and with a twist. The taste is amazing. We had the pork stuffed with apple, the pork chop and the quinoa balls. The meat was tender and the pork chop must be one of the best I have tried on the island. All dishes we had were delicious. Make sure you try their pink lemonades! Service was super friendly, polite and fast. The prices are very reasonable and their portions are large. Will definitely be back whenever in Nicosia to try more of these creative dishes!!

A must visit place!! The decor is authentic and relaxing, the music creates the perfect ambience, the staff are very polite, BUT the food is the reason why I‚Äôve been back again. The food here is FRESH, CREATIVE and DELICIOUS. I don‚Äôt think you will find this quality for the great prices anywhere else in the capital. Take my word for it, go see for yourself!!!

We just had an amazing meal for four. Best pork chop ever! Pork roulade was superb and the lamb just fell off the bone! Worth finding this restaurant and paying for parking. Everything was perfectly cooked and beautifully presented.

So happy to have found this lovely restaurant in my visit to Nicosia. We were very well served and the food was delicious and healthy. The atmosphere and decoration of the place is great as well. It's an amazing place to eat and we would love to come back more often however unfortunately we live in London. 100% recommend this place.
food is average, nothing special. the worst was the Chef's attitude. shouting in front of customers and fighting with a customer as well
Fabulous place with some really exploratory cooking for Cyprus focused on good produce and good quality.... loved the whole thing.... had a traditional Kleftiko which was amazing....
Great food fresh, different Value for money Difficult to book Should handle reservations better but an amazing place to eat

Cook Shop has been offering excellent food for years. This combined with very friendly and professional service makes it one of the best choices for casual lunch in Nicosia. Pricing is very reasonable. Their risotto is the best i ever had in Cyprus.
We had a great lunch from the new menu. Pork Roulade on a red cabbage bed. Excellent. Great atmosphere and good wine choices.

Excellent menu, food,service.Pleasant and homey atmosphere, colorful ambience, we were warmly welcomed and the staff was very willing to help us with the menu. The salads were very fresh and tasty and actually each salad had a unique and distinct taste. Salmon was an excellent choice, the same goes for pasta. We ordered different plates to share and that gave us the chance to try different plates. The wine list was excellent as well. Didn't have much room for desert but we had to try it! Wonderful. Lunch was concluded with Cypriot coffee. Definitely recommended!

Had lunch here. Place was crowded but we were graciously accommodated even though we didn‚Äôt have reservations. An unusual menu. Service was fine. Presentation was thoughtful. Food was delicious. Prices were reasonable. Would recommend and gladly return.
Very Friendly with delicious Different tastes. The food is great any time you go. Great environment both for lunch or dinner
Very good food and friendly atmosphere for a quick lunch in Nicosia city center. Better to book in advance but not a must.
We are lucky here in Nicosia to have such a great restaurant. Evagoras and Amalia , a lovely couple (owners), will make you feel like home. The food is great.
Friendly staff, great environment, unique decoration, peeerfect risotto and burgers. You should definetely try it.
Great food. Good service. Need to book in advance since it's a small place. Open only for lunch. Excellent porcheta and picagna stake

This is the third time we visit this wonderful place. The food is of high standart, well cooked and presented. The atmosphere is unique and very cozy. Until now we tried the steak, the seabass, the mussels and the stuffed chicken. All very tasty! Just one suggestion for the stuffed chicken. In my opinion the chicken and the rice have a rather flat taste and would be good if there was another ingredient to give a bit of intensity in flavour . The cheesecake was devine!

Once again 5/5. Perfect dishes. Very good service. Reasonable pricing.I ve been to this restaurant a few times and always is up to perfection. Mist try the duck and the salad with orange and apple. If you are looking for a restaurant for a perfect lunch this is an ideal choice. Booking is a mist since it is busy most of the time. Especially Saturdays. The only ‚Äúnegative‚Äù is the noise indoor area. If you have the chance book a table outside. The majority of the dishes are outstanding in terms of taste, size and cost.

I used to love this place and consider it one of the best restaurants in Nicosia, but not anymore. his restaurant was a small cosy place, that served dishes made with love. Last time I visited was quite disappointing, as the food quality has dropped and the seating space doubled. Even though their menu remained the same over the past 4 years, I felt that their dishes are not prepared to the same standard as they used to. My favorite main dish (stuffed chicken with cream on top) was dry, lacked flavor and felt like It was pre-cooked. Also they made the burger size smaller. I don‚Äôt think I would be tempted to go there again.

This place lacks of good service. Twice dined in and once ordered delivery. So last time, I ordered the Peruvian salad with shrimps (back in October this was part of the menu), and it was delivered without the shrimps. Boom! Just green leaves. Absolutely nothing else. Well maybe the dressing was there..I hope I don't get another reply from the manager saying again that "obviously this wasn't intentional". I know it wasn't intentional. We all know these things aren't intentional. But this is what makes a bad service right?

Cookshop offers a menu with a variety of dishes!! Tried many of them and never dissapoints! It is one of the best restaurants to enjoy your luch! However, note that it is only open on Friday nights serving dinner
I went for lunch with two friends, great service and amazing flavours, I recommend and will come back for sure!
The burger is probably one of the best in Nicosia! Lovely cosy atmosphere and very friendly staff! Highly recommended!
Went there to have lunch twice. The food quality is always top as well as the food presentation. Extremely polite staff and breastfeeding friendly atmosphere. Do not miss the duck!
Excellent cosy rest, with very good food... very good tasty hamburger... located in the center of Nicosia, so excellent for a business lunch...

Really a nice place to go having a tasty food with some twist and discuss with family and friends. Great atmosphere. The food was good too and the service as well. The steak with the mushrooms was well presented and nicely cooked. I prefer to have less fat. I recommend this place.
Every time I go I enjoy my time there and I find the food and drinks delicious. Try the burger and the lemonade, they are amongst my favorites.

Tasty Food, well presented and served. Excellent service and well mannered waiters. The place is small but cosy. You must reserve well in advance as Friday is the only night in the week are open. Definitely will go back.

Very tasty and nicely cooked food!! Good wine options and excellent service!Very difficult to find a table because it‚Äôs open only Friday night. Wish the restaurant opens more weekday or weekend nights

I wish Cook Shop were open for dinner more than one night a week--and that it was not so difficult to make a reservation. We ate here last Friday and were very impressed. Everything was delicious. I particularly enjoyed the almond-encrusted cod. But the salmon was also wonderful. The wine and beverage selection is large and high-quality. And the prices were less than I expected. I've only found one or two other restaurants in Nicosia with a similar quality/price ratio (e.g. Sexy Fish and Kathodon).

We visited this place on a Friday for lunch. We had salad, a fried calamari for starter which was very good, mussels and pork chop. Everything was very good. One of the best options in Nicosia for lunch. Recommended.
I have been to this restaurant a few times. The standard and quality of the food is always perfect üëåüèª. The price is reasonable. It never lets you down. Enjoy
Very cosy restaurant,nice deco,amazing food,just perfect recipes.The owners are very friendly. For sure we will visit again to try other dishes,will recommend to others.
If not the best it‚Äôs definitely one of the top restaurants in Nicosia. Friendly with a cosy atmosphere and a culinary trip that will leave you thinking about it after! Prices are very reasonable.
We ordered 6 main dishes that we all shared (a party of 6). Every single dish was excellent with a touch from the chef. Strongly recommended.
Went to Cook Shop for lunch on a Saturday. Had to make a reservation though since the place is quite small. You should try the burger and the pork chop. Homemade lemonade also a must.

The atmosphere and service were great, as well as the main courses. We really enjoyed the red beet falafel appetizer.What I didn't like was the fact that the bread from the bread basket served at the beginning of the meal was stale and dry at the edges from having been sitting around too long. Also, the prawn salad had way too much dressing. At the end of our meal we decided to try the Mojito, however it was warm and watered down when it was served.Overall a cute place for a lunch break.
Really delicious dishes at Cook Shop. You can find gourmet dishes at low price. I did enjoy them at the restaurant, at office (via delivery) and at home on Friday night (take out).

After several visits, it is safe to say that the food is always at a high standard, and same goes for the service. Tried the duck, the steak sandwich, the burger, and some other dishes, never left there without a smile. The beer always helped, as was the case with the bill which was very reasonable for what we had. Expect to pay an average of ‚Ç¨11-12 per main dish, plus drinks. Also tried their starters and salads, all were nicely prepared, and reasonably priced. Reservations are almost required, as seating, especially inside is limited. I hope they keep it up!

Have tried the pork chop and salad offer and the salmon and salad offer. Very tasty food and well made. However a bit pricey in my opinion. ‚Ç¨8.50 for a small pork chop and fries and ‚Ç¨8.50 for a small salmon fillet with rice. For daily business lunch it is expensive.
Although a small restaurant, it seems that the cook is a real discovery. Extra and unique taste is added to each dish. Very much enjoyed the lunch.

Cookshop is one of the most friendly, pleasant and cozy place in Nicosia. It has a variety of dishes, the best one by far the stuffed chicken with herbs and don't get me talking on the desserts! I highly recommend it. Just one Small complain. Buy none or two new comfy chairs! But nonetheless I just love it and I think I'l be a regular there!

The only drawback of this place is the opening policy: you may enjoy this wonderful restaurant only at lunch time (and Friday night), but it's close all Sunday.Every other single aspect is top: fresh and elaborated food, nice furniture, soft and fine music broadcasted to your ears at an optimal volume, very kind personnel: anything chosen to deliver a very comfortable experience.I often come here to eat when I'm in Nicosia and every time I thank who introduced to me this place.
Very good for mid-day lunch breaks, up to date menu, cosy environment and frƒ±endly service. Highly recommended!
Loved the food and the service!!! One of the best restaurants to have a dinner in Nicosia. Very friendly ppl and grameat food
Good quality food. Common dishes complimented with an interesting twist. Need to try one of the deserts.
Very nice place to go and eat. Been for lunch and it was very nice. I would most def recommend this place to other people.
Great food, great quality. The meat was cooked the correct way and the salad my friend ordered was very good. Defensively I will be going back in my next visit.
Good quality food at reasonable prices. Fairly good selection of salads and meat dishes. Menu regularly updated.
Great food (we ordered a salad for lunch and the cheesecake for dessert) . The waitresses are really nice, speek fluent English. Totally recommended

We 've been there four times and we loved all of them. The service is excellent, the food is perfect for us and the place is just so casual and relaxed! You can tell that this is a place built and run with love and care! Looking forward to visit again, probably next week :)
Cook shop its by far one of our favourite restaurants in Nicosia. Well made and tasty plates and great service! Favourite dish: the famous burger ( a must try! )
High quality of food, great service and nice atmosphere. A little bit expensive for lunch food to dine in. But I will sure go again.
The service is a bit slow but good food, make sure you have a reservation otherwise, you will not get a table
High quality food, great service and lovely atmosphere. Good variety of appetizing dishes to chose from
AAA amazing little gem in Nicosia. Amazing staff. Food that was simply Devine and amazing atmosphere. For sure will become a regular of this quaint little restaurant
It‚Äôs my first visit to this Nice small restaurant, excellent food and very beautiful decor. Sure will come back with friends. Thanks.
Very nice restaurant, with good friendly family-like atmosphere but dishes that are quite unique. Definitely worth a visit!
The lamb is exceptional as well as the other meats. Service is very good and house bread extremly tasty. Food looks soectacular and has something special. Nice prople!

A cute little restaurant with a nice romantic atmosphere int the center of Nicosia. Very good, interesting dishes. Kind staff: It is really different from all other places in Nicosia. It is worth visiting.

Went there twice and it was both times superb. Sophisticated cooking and presentation both the lamp and the beef I have tried. Salmon and risotto my friends tried was of high quality and taste.The only problem is that it's a small place and it's difficult to find a table.

Its been over a year since we visited the Cook Shop, and we had forgotten how good it is. It is now bigger, the small shop is now expanded into the shop next door, the decor nice and appropriate, there's space outside to sit in the winter sun. But best of all the service and food are of the best quality - and all at a very reasonable price. Was there with the family, 6 of us. We all tried various dishes and all great.

This is the second time I go to this restaurant, so what I write here reflects both visits. The place offers a variety of excellent artisan dishes that can satisfy all tastes. I've tried their risotto, their burger, their salmon and their pork-chop. The staff is very friendly and eager to help. However, both times I was there the service was extremely slow, despite the fact that the place was not packed. I think they are understaffed, or perhaps need extra training. In any case, because I've given this place the benefit of the doubt the first time, but confirmed that service is indeed poor, the second time, I've decided not to go there again. There are plenty of options in the area. Sorry folks :-)
Burger 10.50, Lavraki 12.50, Rokko Salad 9.00, Gluhwein each - really good. ‚Ç¨42.00. Very good and became busy at lunch time - but service was excellent

It‚Äôs a small restaurant offering interesting choices for lunch in a nice environment. It‚Äôs quite popular for lunch during weekdays so service can be relatively slow during peak hours.Food is inspired and very tasty.Recommended!

I loved this place, I went back twice in one week. I strongly recommend their lamb shank and their sea bass. The flavor was great, the fish was cooked perfectly. I loved the atmosphere, its homey. Very kind staff.
No mistake here!!!quality at its best.service that makes you ,visit the place again!!!enjoyed amazing salmon plate
the food was very nice, the staff very friendly amd service was ecxellent..a place that you should visit for sure
Amazing food, nice place and great Staff! :) A piece of heaven for gluten-free and other food-free people! ‚ù§
Excellent food like your mam cook at home. Small but very quit with a character, it reminds me a french countryside bistro. Very good service, busy durring lunch time.

Visited once again the newly renovated cookshop and it was fantastic. Successful romantic renovation that gives you the feeling of being abroad. The new dish of the stuffed chicken with cream and noodles was out of the ordinary. Amazing taste!!!!
You almost can't these kind of places in Cyprus. Definetly worth to come.. Great food, vibe, service, design.

An impressive selection of nicely cooked food at reasonable prices, with nice service, in a cosy atmosphere. Definitely professionals and doing things the proper way, not easy to find quality food in Nicosia
I have visited before but this time was the first time in the evening.The food was exquisite, well cooked and the service excellent despite been full.Shall recommend it to anybody.Bon appetite.

One of the best places to enjoy a very good meal. The food is top quality and the portions are very good. You can enjoy a great stuffed chicken (highly recommended) and of course the desserts. I ve been there a few times and is one of the best places for food lovers in Nicosia.Service is professional and helpful. They allow enough time between courses to enjoy every bite.Reserve a table on busy days to avoid despoilment.
Great food, good quality, excellent service, cozy environment! The staff is really friendly and polite!!!
best restaurant in town! should visit if you like good food! keep visiting. always great. salads, mains, sides, all great!.

Since my first visit to this lovely restaurant, about 2 years ago, it has become my favorite place where the food is never disappointing.The food is delicious made of first quality ingredients. Creative cuisine, a very well balanced menu and wine list which accommodate all tastes. All at very good prices.Excellent service by the people who run the restaurant.Therefore perfect!! A place I never hesitate to recommend!
The most tasteful and delicious food in Cyprus! The best pork chop ever! Great place for lunch!Friendly staff

I visited cookshop for lunch, we were a bit late but the staff was happy to serve us. We enjoyed two different plates and I must admit it was one of the best restaurant food I ever tasted, the plate was well presented, it had amazing taste and aromas. Overall an excellent experience.

From the moment we left this place we promised ourselves that we would go back very soon. The food was excellent, the service friendly but professional and the decor just wonderful. It is indeed a little gem in the heart if Nicosia!

This is a nice place, usually open for lunch. The cook seems a master of his business and likes to experiment. Very nicely decorated and unusual for cyprus taste delicious food. Strongly recommend to try for the expirience. Tried salmon and calamari. Tasty! For two people with two glasses of wine paid about 50 euros. Also, try daily desert. Magic :)
Absolute little gem! Exquisite food, attention to detail, personal contact and all this with value for money! Cannot recommend this little eatery enough! Do reserve ahead!

We had dinner at this excellent restaurant in Feb2017. The dinner was truly excellent, the service perfect, the chef/owner very friendly and attentive, wanted to know our comments and the atmosphere and decor very pleasing. It's really worth a visit but make sure to book as it gets very busy.

Great service, we had lamb shank, duck, porkchop and chicken for main courses. All mains were great. Starter was not impressive had the halloumi which was cold and bland. Chocolate cake was very dry. The atmosphere is great we had a nice evening.

The food and quality is fantastic. Owners are friendly too. The food is fresh and the cost is of medium range. They have beautiful lunch take away menu, giving you a variety of dishes for only 7.50 euro, main meal and salad. so nice.

Visited this place last week for lunch. Both our plates were extremely well cooked and tasty! Actually I had one of the best plates ever. The ambiance of the place itself was also very calm and had its own style, I liked that also very much. Service was excellent. The cost was very low compared to what it offers. We paid only 35 for 3 main plates and a bottle of water. Will certainly go back soon.
Amazing place, amazing food, amazing music, a restaurant that who can go with family or with friends for lunch!

This is one of the most cosy restaurants I have visited in Nicosia! lovely atmosphere with extraordinary recipes! MUST try the stuffed chicken and the duck! range of salads with my favorite chicken mojito! amazing combinations of ingredients that blows your mind!!

The place itself is cosy, well decorated, and does inspire good vibes. The food - even if we appreciated the innovative approach - does not satisfy the senses. The flavours jar.. the rocket salad with berries dressing was overly sweet, the stuffed chicken was interesting, but a little heavy and perhaps too sweet after the berries' salad. The staff is kind and smiley and seem to love the place, but the service is slow, too slow. Prices are ok. We did have high expectations for this innovative little restaurant and we hope for improvement.
Quality food at i's best! This little restaurant will serve you something tasteful and different and NOT empty your pocket!! You should definitely try their burger or the risotto with seafood!!!! :)

Excellent service, reasonable prices, great decoration and excellent food. An unbelievable blending of flavours, textures and smells! A must-eat place for anyone to dine lunch or dinner. Definitely try the burger and the pork.
An unbelievable blending of flavours, textures and smells! A must-eat place for anyone. Definitely try the burger and the chicken

This is charming little restaurant, in a good location, reasonably priced, and the team are enthusiastic, helpful and with a great sense of humor - the service was seamless. The menu also seems interesting. However (and now comes the but), and perhaps it may just have been the day, but I was disappointed with some of my meal. The bruschettas were excellent, the salad was OK, but the chicken (which may other reviewers seem to rave about) was simply disappointing: the meat was dry (very dry...), while the various ingredients (which I love!) did not seem to blend harmoniously. Having said that, some of our group who chose the burger were very satisfied. All in all, this is a good effort which deserves a second chance. I wish them all the best.
Small place with excellent service. The food is amazing and prices are very low for the quality offered.

Had dinner with friends and we had a lovely time. We enjoyed the food but the friendly efficient service was the highlight. Will be back to this restaurant again. Really enjoyed the salads and the chicken was a hit.

Had a delightful lunch at this rather special little place not far outside the city walls and would recommend it to anybody who likes beautifully presented, well cooked, healthy food. The unassuming restaurant frontage belies the quality experience beyond.To start we had smoked aubergine and halloumi bruschetta (portion rather generous, one of these to share between two people would be fine as they serve bread and tasty dip/spread as standard) and the seafood special - prawns, mussels and small crabs in a tasty broth and then, for mains, the stuffed chicken breast with amaretto and coconut sauce and the artichoke and mushroom tagliatelle, all were delicious! The wine was a good price and the Berry lemonade refreshing. Wonderful and high standard service from the owners and staff alike. I cannot wait to come back in the winter as the inside looked attractive and cosy.

Is an excellent place for lunch. Very good service, creative, delicious and well presented dishes. Congrats to the staff especially to the chef. Keep the standard high. A lot of restaurants start with very high standards but end up with poor quality and service.
Excellent. Friendly owners. Great hospitality. You feel like home from the first minute. Small but tasteful menu. Homemade food

A good place with a limited menu and quantities but of good quality.Be aware that reservations and seating is provided only for 4 people or more. If you are 3 you need to seat at the bar even though there are tables (for 4) available.Also quite a few restrictions apply when ordering which also depends on the day.
Nice place for lunch in the capital! Very cute place to sit outside, with frinedly staff and good food !!
High quality food. Excellent set up. Very Good service. Small and beutiful place. It stands out. One of few good restraurants.

Its a small, cozy, unique place with the best food and a great wine selection. You can purchase fresh bread with herbs, dips, the best olives and olive oil with herbs. You can create your dip with olive oil and mix it with a variety of salts you can buy there. The dinning experience is unforgettable due to the excellent quality of food, welcoming stuff and relaxing atmosphere.

This is a very nice small restaurant. Friendly but not intrusive staff and quick service (mind you is a small place). We visited the place twice and we were impressed with the salats. This time We got the burgers and the porkchop. Nice thick juicy burger and double fried real fries were a 400% upgrade from what you get in your average fast food burger joint. The salat we got as extra was excellent! Best you can get in Cyprus. The place is a bit on the small side even if it is nicely decorated. Maybe that way they pay more attention to you. It is around 12-15 euro per person to eat with a refreshment so is not the cheapest choice but is one you will remember for sometime. We ended with an oven cooked cheesecake which was of high standard, but not as good as Rousounides. I wanted to give it 4.5 stars but as the salat with the burger was not of the same standard as the individual one but between 4 and 5, i think 4 is more fair if we keep the 5 for the exceptional few cases. Definitely we will go there again.

I've been here twice on june! At first i visited the restaurant with a friend and 1 week later with a coleague! 2 times in one week - this is how to explain you about the excelence of the food and the service!! Both were above excpectations!!

Small place, small menu, knowledgeable and friendly proprietor. As it should be. Excellent ingredient combinations. Exceptional starters, especially the salads. My pork was very good. The risotto and the budget that my friends tried was even better. Deserts were a disappointment to be honest. Thus the 4 stars.

First of all, the owner Amalia is an amazingly friendly person who takes out the best to make you comfortable while you're having lunch our dinner.The menu is full of special combinations which are blended and put together by her husband Evagoras.The restaurant atmosphere feels like a familiar place, with loads of original vintage pieces and beautifully created details.To be honest, I have never had a stuffed chicken fillet as good as I got here.The stuffing was a combination of goat cheese and raisins, served with a special dressing on an amaretto & coconut base and allround rice, together with a mix of fine vegetables.Anybody visiting Nicosia, make sure you pass this little secret.

We visited Cook Shop for a Saturday lunch.All 3 of us shared the halloumi and smoked eggplant bruschetta topped with berries balsamic vinegar which proved to be amazing and an excellent way to start our meal.I had the stuffed chicken breast with goat cheese and raisins and topped with an Amaretto sauce. The dish was delicious, the sauce was stunning and the chicken was succulent. The dish was accompanied with rice with crushed almonds which proved to be an excellent pairing.One of persons of the table had the seabass (perfect sauce paired with a beetroot and potato mash) and my wife had a very refreshing salad with rucola, watermelon, pastellaki and halloumi.Definitely returning back !!!Thank you for an amazing lunch.

We were thinking of a place for lunch with my husband and mother-in-law today and I randomly saw this in a magazine. We remembered hearing about the Cook Shop from a friend recently so we thought we might give it a shot.That was all we needed! An amazing lunch experience. I had the salad of the day (rocket leaves, grilled halloumi, watermelon balls and pastellaki... Dressed with an amazing dressing). The rest of the party had the fish and chicken... They were delicious! We will definitely be going back! The owners were so polite and their service was excellent. Prices are reasonable.

Stopped by here for lunch recently and what a find! Off the usual 'tourist track', this restaurant was full of locals and is clearly one of their better kept secrets! Well, unfortunately for them I am going to urge you all to try this place as a must visit restaurant if you are in Nicosia (indeed, Cyprus - it is worth the trip). Unexpectedly one of the best burgers I have ever had, washed down with some Paulener Weissbier - another surprise on the menu.I was told by Amalia, who served us very well and was the perfect host, that the menu changes regularly with seasonal produce and new creations from the head chef, Evagoras. The burger, however, has been on the menu from day 1 (two years ago) and I can see why.If you are looking for excellent food in a cosy, informal and local atmosphere then I cannot recommend this place highly enough.

Visited this place with my partner and friend and we loved it... We started off with a salad that we shared... It was rocket/watermelon with halloumi cheese which was yummy.. For mains my friend and I had mussels with pesto sauce and Ginger the taste was so unique. My partner had a chicken dish which he loved... The service food and ambience was lovely... Along with a glass of wine, beery smoothie and large bottle of wine we paid $48.50. Also they bought us bread and two dips on the house... We will be back again.
A tiny restaurant in the city centre of Nicosia, Very friendly staff and the owners always there to help you. Great atmosphere and quality food. We will visit it again for sure.
Cookshop has amazing food always cooked and served to the highest standards. Great prices and the service is always outstanding! Of course the desserts are delicious! Definitely worth visiting!

Simply loved it! My favourite dish is the chicken with crushed nuts and the salmon dish. Quality is excellent, food is gourmet, portions are satisfactory, staff is friendly! Will definitely visit again :)

We came back for lunch this time & where not disapointed! Same good atmosphere, tasty food, local beer & a dessert i felt quilty eating as it was a work of art and last but at least as important friendly staff & service.Until next time
Excellent choices for lunch menu.ideal for lunch breaks.good service and friendly staff. Good location at the city centre! Book in advance,especially for friday evenings

No matter how many times I visit this restaurant, I am always impressed! The menu has an good choice of dishes with interesting sides. The decor is cosy and inviting. The service can not be faulted. The food is cooked to perfection with beautiful presentation and the prices are reasonable. I really can't recommend it enough.

Being a keen Trip Advisor contributor myself, I was intrigued after reading the reviews on the Cook Shop. And let's admit it I was anxious to have lunch there! You know what I am definitely going back, maybe not during the hot months though. Let's start with the Starters. We went for a smoked aubergine salad with halloumi, unique taste and not at all heavy. Word of warning it is a starter not a full blown salad. Accompanied with 1/4 of mussels. They were superb! In terms of Mains, we all had something different. From a beef burger (chips are difficult to resist) to sea bass on beetroot mash, to seafood risotto and finally my dish, salmon cooked in a mango sauce served with asparagus and the most amazing rice which had a subtle almond flavour. Even though we were rather full we thought we'd try the desserts. Only two on the menu, brownies and rice pudding. Two different proposals. Loved them both. The distinct flavour of coconut milk and berries jam on top of the rice pudding. And a light creme brulee flavoured whipped cream accompanying the brownies! All that cost around ‚Ç¨100 including water, soft drink, 3 small bottles of wine and tea/coffee. A very good deal! And a lovely experience overall.

I was taken here recently for lunch and visited a couple more times as well.The food is very good and the portions good too - have tried a few things off the menu and myself and others have been very pleased with what we ate.Recommended place to try.

Excellent service, excellent food. This place is small and cozy, suitable for small groups. The menu is not too big but all the items offered have imagination and character. I would go again without second thought!!!
This place is more than just excellent food! It's unique decor along with the always smiling staff make your lunch time a joyful experience.
Well prepared tasty food, nice salads, good desert. Friendly staff, reasonable prices. Reserve before you go, as there are just a few tables.
The food was so different, all senses were activated and enjoyed it. I would definitely visit again.

Food is really special and out of the ordinary.Service is sort of slow, forces you to take a deep breath and enjoy lunch time!Don't forget to try the fresh bread baked on premises daily!Must start doing dinner as well!

The main attraction for me is the interior of this restaurant. It is pretty, cozy with cool relaxing music. Moreover, the waiters are very polite and it is well situated. In the centre and where it is easy to park. The food is good but not amazing.

I've eaten there a number of times and the food has always been excellent and extremely tasty. It is however a small restaurant and I think it's open on specific days/times therefore check before heading there! Nicely located and close to other amenities

After two visits I have only positive things to say. The food, very fresh, very well prepared, cooked and served. My spouse reminded me that I had duck on our first visit and was very satisfied. Last week we both had vegetable soup, salad and grilled fish. The quality of all choices was excellent. The place, although small, is very quaint and cozy. The Staff are excellent and welcoming. Finally, I normally deduct one star if no draft beer is available, however given that they have bottled beer available from a micro brew (I believe it's Aphrodites rock) which is superb, I gave the fifth star. We look forward to returning again to the CookShop. A very unique establishment.
Very nice cute and cosy little place with friendly owners that care about their customers satisfaction. Their cuisine consists of tasty, selected variety. Look forward to go back. dina&peter Nicosia.

On our second visit we enjoyed our meal as much as the first time! Happy to see the high standards are maintained and the service has improved even more! The food delicious as always and the prices very reasonable! Keep it up guys!

Probably the best place to try dishes originated from the french cuisine in very reasonable prices for the quality of food and materials combined. Hence taste something unusual as well as original along with excellent presentation in every dish you order. Everyone can find something suitable to eat according to their preferences!
Quality food for value, amazing customer service. Must visit gem in nicosia. Value for money, best newcomer restaurant in the city
Not to be missed!!! There were 3 of us each ordered a different main as well as a salad to share. They were all mouthwatering and very good size portions. Definitely recommended
A charming delight for lunch with friends or colleagues. Everything on the menu is delicious. It's our favourite haunt.

Went there with a group of 4 more people. The food was great, quality and quantity-wise. You feel the good vibes from the polite way you are greeted as soon as you arrive.. Sadly it doesn't have a lot of space outside and its a bit cold as they only have home use petrol heaters scattered, that dont really do much outside , and there is not much seating space but maybe thats what makes the quality of service so spectacular. The waitress was cheerful and polite , the food was nicely and quickly served , I chose salmon, my friends the chop and the chicken. We were all really pleased. Choices of wine on the list , were adequate. The brief menu makes it easy to understand that there is "art" in your food.Sweets and coffee after food were ok , although i think that it would have elevated their services if they had them "on the house ".i would definitely go there once a month if it wasnt so difficulty to find some space due to the fact that they open only some days of the week. But definitely if you manage to do so it would always make it worth the wait.

If you are a gastronomy fan, find this little restaurant in the heart of the city of Nicosia.Family runned with an excellent variety of disches from starters to main course and desert this restaurant is here to stay... so we will keep going...My peronal best chicken with coconut sauce!!

Situated in one of my favourite streets of Nicosia, this little restaurant is great for a quick, yet filling lunch. Menu comprises of a few salads, a couple of starters and about a dozen of main dishes, all with an interesting twist. Everything we ordered was reasonably priced and tasted great, while the service was exceptional! I will definitely return for more!

This is a great little restaurant in the middle of Nicosia. Excellent food, great service, nice ambience. We can't wait to go back for lunch. The young talented chef Evagoras creates delicious recipes with the best of ingredients to create an excellent culinary experience every single time! Thank you guys, keep up the good work!

Excellent food, with interesting choices. We have tried the marinated pork chop and we really enjoyed it. The staff and atmosphere are lovely. The only downside: difficult to find a parking spot at the area.

Our great experience started with the reservation; the process was very smooth and professional; that was followed by a very warm reception and a big smile.The restaurant is very clean and cozy; very nicely decorated, and highly relaxing.The menu is very simple; containing a very clear and detailed description of a good variety of food that would satisfy any taste; I couldn‚Äôt find the Paella on the menu; the host offered a Seafood Tagliatelle in lieu; that was a great advice.The service was quick and very friendly; starting with fresh Sliced and aromatic Bread with Vegetable Dip, followed by the Fresh Peppery Baby Ruccola Salad Topped with Melted Camembert, and the three main Courses; the Pistachio & Almond Risotto Topped with Kaseri Cheese was perfect; Seafood Tagliatelle in Fresh Tomato & Herb Sauce was very fresh and tasty; the Beef Burger was cooked to perfection and the French Fries were crispy and delicious.The superb experience was not to be complete without the delicious Crispy Apple Pie with Vanilla Ice Cream; it was one of the best we have eaten for a long time.With all this high quality food and sizable portions served; the prices are really cheap; in summary; it is a must visit.

Not as advertised as other places so it took me a while to discover, but so glad I did! Cook shop is one of the few places I look forward to eating at in Cyprus. In a class of it's own, where everything from the decor to the food has been clearly thought through with an added personal touch, this restaurant is a refreshing surprise. Be sure to reserve in advance, as the place is almost always full. Fantastic service!

We came in with high expectations and the drop was long.All 6 main dishes (each one ordered something) was a complete bust.The risotto was under cooked, pork belly was dry, fish wasn't fresh, and so was all sea food dishes.It took over 1 hour to receive our dishes so you can imagine our disappointment.There are much nicer places within walking distance, take your chance there first.

These guys love what they do and that shines through from the moment you even call up for a reservation (fully booked but they found a way to squeeze myself and my wife in!).The only thing better than their service is the food they create.Unfortunately for anyone reading this, I had the Whole Hog (I think that was its name but I've had a few beers and just want to call it "Pig Deluxe" but I know that's wrong!) - five types of pork cuts cooked five different ways - which was a Friday one off. It goes without saying that it was glorious. The regular menu option of Orange Duck, which my wife chose, was cooked to perfection and would make anyone not called Donald very happy.Summary - 6 stars must visit.

To be honest, when it comes to food most on Nicosia's eateries are mediocre at best. Not this place. The Cook Shop manages to deliver delicious, soul warming, unpretentious comfort food... And it actually achieves this through a pretty imaginative menu. Kudos to the chef. Amazing place that keeps calling you back for more.

We came here with my boyfriend for a little lunch, attracted by all the posts on Tripadvisor, and also because it's close from our house. Quiet ambiance, little terrace, and home-made bread (the best I've eaten here, and I am French, from the country of the baguette, so it's matter !) with veggie dips offered : the beggining was perfect. And after... It was better ! We shared a salmon burger and a chicken salad, with a lot of crispy and healthy seeds. All flavours were very well-balanced and so good ! We were so happy of our meal, and the waitress was also a very nice and smiling person, with a perfect french ! For sure we will come soon, don't hesitate, this restaurant is amazing :) :)

We turned up on Friday evening with no reservation, but although the restaurant was completely full, Amalia found us a seat at the bar. We had a lovely meal with friendly chat with the staff throughout. My wife left her glasses on the bar, and Amalia posted on facebook that they had been found so we could go and collect them. Best meal of the holiday in Cyprus!
Excellent food, with interesting choices. Staff and atmosphere are lovely. The only downside is that it's a small place

The first time I visited the place, it was recommended to me to try the stuffed chicken and I remember I was talking about it for days.Next time I wanted to try something different and I went for Jambalaya which at the time I had no idea what it was. Apparently is another version of paella, much more interesting though. All the spices blend in so harmonically and the result is superb!Last time I wasn't that hungry so I ordered the chicken salad, feeling miserable that I wouldn't try another signature dish. I was up for a great surprise, it was the best chicken salad I ever had and I honestly can't wait to visit this amazing place again!The ambience is very cute and cosy and the lady who served us, Amalia (co-owner as well) is so cheerful and helpful, you simply want to visit again!The only negative issue with Cook Shop is that it is only open for lunch on weekdays and Friday evening which makes it very difficult to visit, hence not giving the full stars.

A restaurant to be successful needs people to love what they are doing and respect there customers.So the owner is a professional shelve and he knows how to keep ALWAYS the high standards in quality food ,nicely presented and fresh.The management is organise and maintain by his wife that have excellent manners within her.

IT is truly one of the best in Nicosia, even maybe the best restaurant we have in the city. The food is amazing, i personally liked the pork belly which was awesome! The staff is super helpful and nice. Thanks a lot guys.
The food is excellent ,the service is great and the stuff helpful, very warm place!!!Enjoyable place to have lunch

We had a truly wonderful evening at the Cook Shop, expertly and joyfully run by a husband and wife team who make you feel special from the moment you arrive. The food is thoughtfully and beautifully prepared and presented ... our favorite dish on this visit was a seafood tagliatelle ... and the menu is extensive and very reasonably priced. The atmosphere is equally welcoming and warm. We will be frequent and happy visitors!
Excellent quality and variety of food, very friendly service and the setting is very nice and cosy! Would certainly recommend this restaurant to someone looking for somewhere to eat in nicosia!

A cosy restaurant with friendy and attentive staff! The food was exceptionally tasty. My fish paella was loaded with fish and it tasted fantastic! The bread also made an impression as it had a very unique taste.However the hight light were the burgers which we purchased and cooked on another occasion at home! YUMMY! Best burgers ever!Would definetely go back for lunch or dinner at first chance!

A local gem of a restaurant! Well worth a visit when in Nicosia! Friendly & serviceminded staff. Lovely relaxed atmosphere. Delicious food to go with tasty bear (local) & vine. Recomend booking in advance om the weekend. We'll be back üòâ

Cyprus is under a huge cloud of dust, the temperature's at 41 degrees in Nicosia, and for various other reasons we were having a pretty miserable day. Thank God, then, for Amalia and the team at The Cook Shop, who provided just about the best dining experience I've had in Cyprus. The restaurant is a converted little square shop, done up with just enough detail to make it a welcoming place, and the owners are simply lovely people who clearly have a passion for modern food in all its guises. The library of cookbooks alone proves that: all the stalwarts plus such gems as Modernist Estonian Cooking and The Art of Sausagemaking (titles may vary).All of that comes out in the food, which is uniformly excellent and has loads of little flourishes of the sort that most Cypriot restaurants (even the ones where they can cook) simply wouldn't bother to do. I had a gloriously nutty and al dente pistachio risotto scattered with little pink peppercorns; my wife enjoyed her well-done burger, though as a vegetarian I can't comment further on that. The owners provide great conversation table-side, and the pricing is definitely value for money. I look forward to becoming a regular.
Very good food, excellent service! The food is excellent and the service as well! The staff is very friendly!

It was a real surprise! Beautiful place, delicious food , very polite staff and very good prices! We ate a pork chop and a burger and they were both well cooked and nicely presented. Desert was also very nice. We enjoyed the cosy atmosphere very much.We will definitely go back again !

Listing this as a French restaurant is a little misleading, but that doesn't take anything away from the food. Interesting, European dishes are served here. I won't repeat what others have said, save to say the young couple running the restaurant should decide whether they are opening evenings or not, as doing so on Friday as a trial only betrays their inexperience and will probably not give them an accurate representation of running a restaurant in the evenings anyway (and lunchtimes and evenings too require a whole different setup!)The food is pleasant, the menu changes from time to time but that allows them to do what they do well. We shared a lamb special and a risotto and side salad. My husband had a fabulous looking banana cheesecake to help his cholesterol levels increase. All was cooked well, except I was surprised not to be asked how we would like the lamb to be cooked. I was also disappointed that cheese was put on the risotto given I had voiced some food allergies - there was just a lack of awareness there that I think that in this day and age they could have suggested alternatives or modifications to dishes, which they did not do.The owners are keen, passionate and friendly people. They want to find out what you're enjoying as they genuinely want to improve and make changes where they can. I'd perhaps ask them to ease off just a tiny weeny bit on the friendliness and after I've told you what I can't eat, don't bring me a serving of delicious-looking homemade forbidden fruit (bread) next time I'm there!

Very creative menu.All the dishes on the menu are unique.Taste, portion size and presentation very well taken care of.The paella and the mussels which i tried were excellent.Owners very hospitable and willing to please their customers.New dishes added to the menu frequently.You just feel that you should go there again and again to try them all.Open only for lunch but on fri its also open for dinner !!
Nice place. Elegant the food is tasty and the owner very friendly. Maybe should consider a bigger variety of options. Recommended!

A young couple put all their passion in a place that has become our favorite casual (yet very stylish and delicious) neighborhood spot. Great taste and style in both food and decor- Amalia and her partner have designed and made most of what constitutes the decor of place themselves, mostly by creatively repurposing old family possessions.Amalia takes care of the service herself; the place is small and cozy so she welcomes guests, takes orders, and serves, always with a smile. Since there are many regulars like us, she knows and remembers our dietary preferences, and always ensures to let us know about adjustments that can be made in the menu to suit our needs.A favorite among locals, since it's a very unique place with a strong personality and great value for money. Strongly recommended!

Wonderful environment. When in the restaurant you are somewhere in the French countryside. A bright smile from the lady owner welcomes every customer making you feel very comfortable even if this is your first time there. To cut a long story short:1. The place is wonderful, it's a real small and precious bijoux, not a "faux" niot at all.2. My choice was the "Pistachio risotto with artichoke hearts". May be the very best risotto i had in the recent years3. Salad : Roccula with apples and oranges, roasted walnuts topped with melted camembert drizzled with red currant dressing. "Sounds" promising? Well, taste it! These guys keep their promises.My colleague ordered the Pulled pork in a bun with double cheese, smoked bacon with French fries and salad. He went back to the Cook Shop after 2 or 3 days. I think this says it all.When we went there we had to go upstairs where there is a tiny loft. Wonderful - only two tables, ideal for couples in love but....very noisy as all the noise from the main hall downstairs...flies to those sitting upstairs. So, when you call for a reservation, ask for a table downstairs.Sadly, this wonderful restaurant is not open for weekends and diner.Value for money 100%.

Superb food, unique tastes, cooked with fresh ingredients and so value for money! the service was great, nice atmosphere, the music, the decoration all in perfect tune! make room for dessert especially crema catalana! would definitely go back soon!

Cookshop is small and cosy restaurant just outside the old town. The friendly staff make for a pleasant atmosphere. The food is delicious, from the home made bred served as a starter, to the mouthwatering desserts. The prices are extremely good. Since it is a small place it would best to make a reservation.This is probably my favourite restaurant!
Best mussels served in nicosia!Great home made feta cheese with herbs and fresh home made bread.Nice environment,relaxing music and friendly staff.Bon apetit!

The food here was absolutely fantastic. Three of us had different dishes and each one was delicious (Mussels, Penne and Pulled Pork). Certainly the best mussels I have ever had.The place is tiny so advanced booking is recommended although we did walk off the street and place was found for us.The service was charming and friendly and added to the lovely food made this an exceptional lunch in Nicosia.

Looking from outside you can hardly tell what this place is all about.Once inside, you can enjoy the best burger in Cyprus. Seabass (enjoyed by a family member) was also exceptional.The service is amazing and the price is good.Highly recommended. A reservation is needed however.
One of the best restaurants I have been to both quality wise and service wise. One of the best stakes I have eaten. Surely go to it again. Highly recommend it for travelers that are nearby.

Cookshop is a cozy little place with a homely feeling - it feels like stepping into someone's living room. And the hospitality of Evagoras and Amalia only enhances this feeling.Their love of quality food shines through and I am so happy I found this little gem to have my lunch the 2 days I was in Cyprus. I couldn't have hoped for a better place to eat - and the beers are definitely "Brian approved" :-)
Delicious food,great place and wonderful staff!Always ask for the dessert of the day Don't forget to take with you home their homemade products.
The best restaurant in town guys really. The pork chop is great the belly is awesome!! The staff is super helpful and smiley.. Wish it will be around for many many years.
Fantastic environment for you to sit and enjoy your food! Great menu for you to try with strange compinations!! Also if you are lucky enough you can taste evagora's (chef) beer!!

This place is so unique! Amalia and Evagoras have established a certain character for their place. The ambience is excellent, relaxing and calm with french chansons at the backround. Everything tastes wonderfull! I also had my hens' night party here - you can have the place for private dinner if you have the minimum number of people. It was one of the best days of my life - not only for the occasion and my friends' surprises, but also because it took place here.

If you are in town, this is the place to be. Great atmosphere with vintage decor and food to die for. The menu offers you great choices. Don't hesitate to ask Evagoras, the owner, for his opinion. Nevertheless, everything's great. Great place for a romantic night out or lunch with friends. Don't forget to take a freshly baked bread at home.

Home made bread and a delicious dip on the house. Sea bass cooked to perfection with beautiful side dishes. A dessert of Orange Cheesecake that was to die for and fabulous coffee to end! Service was excellent. Ambiance was simple, tasteful and cozy. Small restaurant with very high standards and fair prices. Can't wait to go again!
Gastronomie in its best, highly recommended, a place to enjoy with friends or family and for a romantic moment ;-) food made with care and love Booking is recommended ;-) enjoy!

Great atmosphere in an original place. Been there three times so far for launch and i strongly recommend this. If you love meet you should try the amazing burger or the pork chop. Will definitely visit again.
Had a great dinner, excellent menu, not too many options but covers a wide range of tastes. Excellent value & service. Close to center, open for lunch Mon - Sat, and for dinner only on Fridays
Excellent homemade bread!! We've had pork chop and salmon which were amazing üëåThe service and atmosphere are outstanding!

I visited this place three times so far, and planning for more. Besides the warm and friendly atmosphere the food there is the reason to go. A menu not copied from another restaurant like all others do. Food with different flavors, sauces with almond and much more. It reminded me of an American Mom & Paps kitchen.

I visited The Cookshop with friends who have lived in Nicosia for a long time and who are familiar with good local restaurants. The owners are the staff and they are very friendly and willing to explain the menu to help you make your selection.The menu was varied and good sized portions.We all enjoyed our choices, the risotto, the mussels, the marinaded pork and the pulled pork and would certainly recommend any of these dishes. The homemade bread is wonderful!Hope you enjoy the food as much as we did.
It's a very nice restaurant with very good food. It wasn't a huge meal but a very good one. The service was good as well. Nice one
